body.p:
Harrodsburg Ky
April 1st 1861
HonGov B Magoffin

Dear Sir If you can R consistently with a since of duty Remit the fine against my son John for a difficulty he had with Richd Scott some monthes ago you will much oblige me -- Some friends Replevied the debt for him and the officer holding the Execution will in a few days sell property to pay it off
your interposition in the case will verry much oblige yours &c &c
P, S, the fine took place last may as I am informed and about $20
